title: NCRTC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Assistant Manager Post
description: The National Capital Region Transport Corporation (NCRTC) has released the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Assistant Manager Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Diploma in Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NCRTC Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online throug...
